subject: Sexual Health
title: History of Puberty Education
description: A fast breakdown of History of Puberty Education for builders.

hook.text: For most of history, nobody explained puberty to children. They discovered their changing bodies alone.

buildup.text: Formal puberty education only began in the early 1900s, tied to public health campaigns against STIs.

discovery.text: By the 1960s, schools began teaching biology-based sex education including puberty and reproduction.

twist.text: Puberty education remains controversial. Many countries still provide little or none, leaving millions uninformed.

climax.text: Evidence shows that comprehensive puberty education improves health outcomes and reduces risky behavior.

punchline.text: Knowledge reduces fear. Silence does not protect children.
